argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dmres | |- dom ( A |` B ) = ( B i^i dom A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_incom | |- ( B i^i dom A ) = ( dom A i^i B ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_eqtri | |- dom ( A |` B ) = ( dom A i^i B ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( C e. dom ( A |` B ) <-> C e. ( dom A i^i B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_smores | |- ( ( Smo ( A |` B ) /\ C e. dom ( A |` B ) ) -> Smo ( ( A |` B ) |` C ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan2br | |- ( ( Smo ( A |` B ) /\ C e. ( dom A i^i B ) ) -> Smo ( ( A |` B ) |` C ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( Smo ( A |` B ) /\ C e. ( dom A i^i B ) /\ Ord B ) -> Smo ( ( A |` B ) |` C ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( dom A i^i B ) C_ B |
| 9 | 8 | #P_sseli | |- ( C e. ( dom A i^i B ) -> C e. B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ordelss | |- ( ( Ord B /\ C e. B ) -> C C_ B ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( C e. B /\ Ord B ) -> C C_ B ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( C e. ( dom A i^i B ) /\ Ord B ) -> C C_ B ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( Smo ( A |` B ) /\ C e. ( dom A i^i B ) /\ Ord B ) -> C C_ B ) |
| 14 |  | #P_resabs1 | |- ( C C_ B -> ( ( A |` B ) |` C ) = ( A |` C ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_smoeq | |- ( ( ( A |` B ) |` C ) = ( A |` C ) -> ( Smo ( ( A |` B ) |` C ) <-> Smo ( A |` C ) ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 14, 15 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( Smo ( A |` B ) /\ C e. ( dom A i^i B ) /\ Ord B ) -> ( Smo ( ( A |` B ) |` C ) <-> Smo ( A |` C ) ) ) |
| 17 | 7, 16 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( Smo ( A |` B ) /\ C e. ( dom A i^i B ) /\ Ord B ) -> Smo ( A |` C ) ) |
